intro.description: Debrief offers more than just a static overview of vessel tracks - it allows you to control the time period of data shown.

item.title: Check you have some data
item.description: In the top left hand corner of Debrief you should find the Navigator window. If is isn't there, select "Navigator" from Debrief's Window/Show View menu. Also check you have our sample data-files - it they're not there, find how to load them from the "Loading sample data" cheat-sheet.

item.title: Open the sample plot-file
item.description: Double-click on 'sample.xml' in the Navigator window, and the sample plot will open.

item.title: Fit to window
item.description: To make sure all of the data is visible, click on the "Fit-to-Window" toolbar button.

item.title: View the time controller
item.description: In the top section of the left hand column in Debrief is the Time Controller. If it's not at the top, click on it's tab to highlight it. If it's not visible at all, open it by selecting "Time Controller" from the "Window/Show View" drop-down menu.

item.title: Check you have some data
item.description: In the top left hand corner of Debrief you should find the Navigator window. If is isn't there, select "Navigator" from Debrief's Window/Show View menu.

item.title: Check you have a workspace
item.description: Before you can link in existing data, you need to define a project for your work. This is a parent folder within which your links are stored. If your Navigator window is empty, you must follow the "Generating a project" cheat-sheet accessed from the Help/Cheat Sheets menu.

item.title: Add a new Folder
item.description: Right-click on your current project in the Navigator view, then select 'Folder' from the 'New' sub-menu. The New Folder wizard will open.

item.title: Show the Advanced options
item.description: Still in the New Folder Wizard, click the 'Advanced' button to display the Advanced options.

item.title: Linking to an existing folder
item.description: Click on the 'Link to folder in the file system', and navigate to the target folder

item.title: Done
item.description: Well done, there you are. Just repeat this process to add any other data directories you want to load data from.
